purpose: Enable applied reinforcement learning with a focus on user-friendly interfaces and modular components for custom agent development.
principle: Builds on TensorFlow to implement reinforcement learning algorithms with a modular architecture, supporting various environments and policies.
reusability: Offers an extensible API for custom agent creation, supports integration with OpenAI Gym environments, and allows for easy configuration of learning models.
limitations: Primarily designed for research and experimentation; may not be optimized for production-level deployment. Limited support for non-TensorFlow environments.
name: tensorforce
description: Tensorforce: a TensorFlow library for applied reinforcement learning
highlight: Tensorforce provides a high-level, modular interface for reinforcement learning with TensorFlow, facilitating rapid prototyping and experimentation.
